interface.name: StatisticalMultivariateSummary
interface.javadoc:
Reporting interface for basic multivariate statistics.
1.2
$Id: StatisticalMultivariateSummary.java 1416643 2012-12-03 19:37:14Z tn $

Returns the dimension of the data
The dimension of the data

Returns an array whose i<sup>th</sup> entry is the mean of the i<sup>th</sup> entries of the arrays that correspond to each multivariate sample
the array of component means

Returns the covariance of the available values.
The covariance, null if no multivariate sample have been added or a zeroed matrix for a single value set.

Returns an array whose i<sup>th</sup> entry is the standard deviation of the i<sup>th</sup> entries of the arrays that correspond to each multivariate sample
the array of component standard deviations

Returns an array whose i<sup>th</sup> entry is the maximum of the i<sup>th</sup> entries of the arrays that correspond to each multivariate sample
the array of component maxima

Returns an array whose i<sup>th</sup> entry is the minimum of the i<sup>th</sup> entries of the arrays that correspond to each multivariate sample
the array of component minima

Returns the number of available values
The number of available values

Returns an array whose i<sup>th</sup> entry is the geometric mean of the i<sup>th</sup> entries of the arrays that correspond to each multivariate sample
the array of component geometric means

Returns an array whose i<sup>th</sup> entry is the sum of the i<sup>th</sup> entries of the arrays that correspond to each multivariate sample
the array of component sums

Returns an array whose i<sup>th</sup> entry is the sum of squares of the i<sup>th</sup> entries of the arrays that correspond to each multivariate sample
the array of component sums of squares

Returns an array whose i<sup>th</sup> entry is the sum of logs of the i<sup>th</sup> entries of the arrays that correspond to each multivariate sample
the array of component log sums
